description: This is a small makeshift tank for storing oxygen, welded from sheet metal.  Commonly used in emergency situations, it provides immediate relief for asthma attacks or smoke inhalation, and can provide a brief burst of energy.  It needs to be connected to an oxygen mask to be used, and can contain much less oxygen for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.
